name: Amogus 0.5
description:
This is the best amogus impostor Singleplayer experience, Made in 48 hours!!!!!

Kill all the crewmembers without being (sus)pected and you win, but be careful, the game gets harder as emergency meetings happen, untill either they complete their tasks, they suspect you or you kill them all. 
There is cameras, Vents and what else do i need to say, its amogus impostor.
If you beat hard level send us a message because we seriously dont know if it is even  possible. 

Thanks for playing and just ignore the sugested donation amount, unless you're jeff bezos, then you know what to do.
